## bscli vault update

update an existing vault.

### Synopsis

update an existing vault.

```
bscli vault update [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  
  Unix based OS:  (use single quotes)
      sl1cmd update -k 'pass1234'
  Windows: (use double quotes)
      sl1cmd update -k "pass1234"
```

```
  -k, --key string   API key value
```
